page.title: 16ASTLEY HOSPITAL
page.content: {ASTLEY HOSPITAL'S }MAIN HOUSE WAS BUILT IN{1650.}BEFORE IT WAS A HOSPITAL IT WAS A MANOR HOUSE. THIS BELONGED TO{ADAM AND MARGARET MORT.} THE GROUND FLOOR HAS 9 ROOMS. IT WAS A FEVER HOSPITAL IN THE 19TH AND 20TH CENTURY. NOW IT IS A NORMAL HOSPITAL. THE VISITING TIME IS 2PM TILL 3PM AND 5:30PM TILL 7PM FOR CHILDREN. ADULT VISITING IS FROM 2PM TILL 3PM AND 7PM TILL 8PM. THE HOSPITAL HAS{105 BEDS.} CHANGES ARE PRESENTLY BEING MADE IN THE{GERIATRIC WARD}WHICH IS BEING CHANGED INTO A{CHRONIC SICK WARD FOR {THE YOUNG}AND ANOTHER WARD IS BEING CLOSED FOR UP_DATING. SOME OF THE{ANCIENT TREES}IN ASTLEY HOSPITAL'S GROUNDS ARE PROTECTED BY{ {THE TREE PRESERVATION ORDER}OF{WIGAN {METROPOLITAN BOROUGH COUNCIL.}
